Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: More than $200 million will be wagered in Nevada sports books on the N.C.A.A. men’s college basketball tournament, a sum double that bet on the Super Bowl.
snippet: More than $200 million will be wagered in Nevada sports books on the N.C.A.A. men’s college basketball tournament, a sum double that bet on the Super Bowl.
